import React, { useState } from "react" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import "./footer.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Footer = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const [t] = useTranslation("global"); return ( <>

{t("footer.h1")}

{t("footer.span")}

{t("section.h1")}

{t("head.span")}

{t("footer.p1")}

{t("footer.p2")}

{t("footer.Explore")}

    setClick(false)}>
  • {t("header.li3")}
  • {t("header.li2")}
  • {t("header.li5")}
  • {t("header.li6")}

{t("footer.QLinks")}

    setClick(false)}>
  • {t("header.li6")}
  • {t("footer.Terms & Conditions")}
  • {t("footer.Privacy")}
  • {t("footer.FAQs")}

{t("footer.question")}

  • {t("footer.address")}
  • +1 214 000 0000
  • professionalrevise@gmail.com

Copyright Â© 2023 SMART EDITOR, an affiliate of BIOBILI Biotech Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.

) } export default Footer
